Names of participants: (Please print neatly)

Note: There are useful notes after this page.

CIPHER.317.cipherString: Man can make himself master over much, hardly can necessity and length of time subdue his spirit.
CIPHER.317.question: A quote by Goethe has been encoded using the Aristocrat Cipher for you to decode.
CIPHER.317.author: Goethe

CIPHER.307.cipherString: It is useless to attempt to reason a man out of a thing he was never reasoned into.
CIPHER.307.question: The following quote by Swift needs to be decoded with the Nihilist Substitution Cipher with a keyword of STORE and polybius key of GASOLINE.
CIPHER.307.author: Swift

CIPHER.302.cipherString: I hope when I inevitably choke to death on gummy bears people just say I was killed by bears and leave it at that.
CIPHER.302.question: A quote by an unknown person has been encoded using the K1 Aristocrat Cipher for you to decode.  You are told it ends with the word THAT.
CIPHER.302.author: Unknown

CIPHER.297.cipherString: Dream big and aim higher, give the universe permission to show you what's possible if you don't limit yourself!
CIPHER.297.question: Decode this quote by Felecia Etienne which has been encoded using the Caesar Cipher.
CIPHER.297.author: Felecia Etienne

CIPHER.312.cipherString: Men ilve best upon a little: nature hsa ordained awl too eb hapy, if they would but learn how two ewes her gifts.
CIPHER.312.question: Decode a quote by Claudius that has been encoded using the K1 Aristocrat Cipher.  Unfortunately the message was received over a bad connection, so there are some errors in it.
CIPHER.312.author: Claudius

CIPHER.313.question: The following cryptarithm provides the key to decoding the values 9103756 45108 0842769. What do they decode to?

CIPHER.306.cipherString: An expert is an ordinary person who consistently sought knowledge in a specific field and applied it.
CIPHER.306.question: A quote by Gift Gugu Mona has been encoded using the Aristocrat Cipher for you to decode.
CIPHER.306.author: Gift Gugu Mona

CIPHER.295.cipherString: It feels awfully nice to be a little kinder to yourself and everybody else.
CIPHER.295.question: The following quote by Sarah Hays Coomer needs to be decoded with the Porta Cipher with a keyword of BLANKET
CIPHER.295.author: Sarah Hays Coomer

CIPHER.316.cipherString: El éxito no es permanente y la derrota no es fatal; lo que cuenta es el coraje para continuar.
CIPHER.316.question: A quote by an unknown person in Spanish has been encoded using the Aristocrat Cipher for you to decode. It has been encoded using a K1 alphabet using an English keyword.
CIPHER.316.author: Unknown
CIPHER.316.translation: Success is not permanent and defeat is not fatal; what counts is the courage to continue.

CIPHER.309.cipherString: A zebra does not change its spots.
CIPHER.309.question: The following quote by Al Gore needs to be decoded with the Affine Cipher where a=19 and b=3.
CIPHER.309.author: Al Gore

CIPHER.314.cipherString: Guard yourself with a positive attitude, conviction, hope and fulfillment of your heart's desire.
CIPHER.314.question: A quote by Sunday Adelaja has been encoded using the Aristocrat Cipher for you to decode.  You are told it contains the word AND.
CIPHER.314.author: Sunday Adelaja

CIPHER.305.cipherString: Deal with the world the way it is, not the way you wish it was.
CIPHER.305.question: A quote by John Chambers has been encoded using the Fractionated Morse Cipher for you to decode. You are told that the quote starts with DEAL WITH.
CIPHER.305.author: John Chambers

CIPHER.304.cipherString: Even if you play perfectly, a fault of your opponent's can destroy the entire beauty of the game.
CIPHER.304.question: A quote by Vladimir Kramnik has been encoded using the K1 Aristocrat Cipher for you to decode.
CIPHER.304.author: Vladimir Kramnik

CIPHER.303.cipherString: The simple and familiar hold the secrets of the complex and unknown.
CIPHER.303.question: Decode this quote by Edward B. Burger which has been encoded using the Atbash Cipher.
CIPHER.303.author: Edward B. Burger

CIPHER.315.cipherString: Instruction ends in the schoolroom, but education ends only with life. A child is given to the universe to be educated.
CIPHER.315.question: A quote by Frederick William Robertson has been encoded using the K2 Patristocrat Cipher for you to decode.  You are told it begins with INSTR.
CIPHER.315.author: Frederick William Robertson

CIPHER.294.cipherString: Failures are with heroic minds the stepping-stones to success.
CIPHER.294.question: A quote by Haliburton has been encoded using the Complete Columnar Cipher for you to decode. You are told that the quote has ONESTO somewhere in it.
CIPHER.294.author: Haliburton

CIPHER.310.cipherString: Only those who look with the eyes of children can lose themselves in the object of their wonder.
CIPHER.310.question: A quote by Eberhard Arnold has been encoded using the K2 Aristocrat Cipher for you to decode.  You are told it starts with the word ONLY.
CIPHER.310.author: Eberhard Arnold

CIPHER.301.cipherString: Clear thinking at the wrong moment can stifle creativity.
CIPHER.301.question: Baconian Sequence Quote Author: Karl Lagerfeld
CIPHER.301.author: Karl Lagerfeld

CIPHER.300.cipherString: Music has always been my protection against the world, from a very young age. I feel safe inside of a jam.
CIPHER.300.question: A quote by Trey Anastasio has been encoded using the Aristocrat Cipher for you to decode.  You are told it contains the words OF and MY.
CIPHER.300.author: Trey Anastasio

CIPHER.308.cipherString: He that diggeth a pit shall fall into it.
CIPHER.308.question: The following strange phrases encode a quote by Old Testament using a Baconian cipher. You are told that the cipher text ALONG SHINY STOCK BOXES decodes to be THAT.
CIPHER.308.author: Old Testament

CIPHER.311.cipherString: Be content with your uniqueness in this world and live a life of happiness.
CIPHER.311.question: The following quote by Gift Gugu Mona needs to be decoded with the Nihilist Substitution Cipher with a keyword of LEARN and polybius key of VANDERBILT.
CIPHER.311.author: Gift Gugu Mona

CIPHER.299.cipherString: Wisdom oft times consists of knowing what to do next.
CIPHER.299.question: The following symbols encode a quote by Herbert Hoover using a Baconian cipher
CIPHER.299.author: Herbert Hoover

CIPHER.298.cipherString: I'm not scared of anything in particular, but I am motivated by a fear of failure as opposed to a need to succeed.
CIPHER.298.question: A quote by Heston Blumenthal has been encoded using the Aristocrat Cipher for you to decode.
CIPHER.298.author: Heston Blumenthal

CIPHER.296.question: The following cryptarithm provides the key to decoding the values 53761 5478 89372 03471. What do they decode to?
